comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Maude Fay (also spelled Maud Fay; 18 April 1878 – 7 October 1964) was an American operatic soprano who was known for singing dramatic roles." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maude_Fay Another photo of her:

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: LOC not misspelling: it's not "a Gurrune" but "a. Gutrune" (as Gutrune). Gutrune is the sister of Gunther in Richard Wagner's opera "Götterdämmerung" (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%B6tterd%C3%A4mmerung)

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you so much for this information. We'll add some of it to the record the next time we update.
